text.div:
This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/sushi-sandbox/CodeSystem/argo-group-characteristic defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
location LocationPatients are all at the location specified by the value which names the physical structures managed/operated by an organization (e.g., a ward, building, clinic, etc)

name: ArgonautGroupCharacteristicCodeSystem
title: Argonaut Group Characteristic Code System
description: Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'|...

concept.definition: Patients are all at the location specified by the value which names the physical structures managed/operated by an organization (e.g., a ward, building, clinic, etc)
